sentences.sContent: If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.
sentences.sCn: 如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。

sentences.sContent: In fact, the huge inheritance does not do him any good, but tends to undermine his vigor and passion for life.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, the huge inheritance does not do him any good, but tends to undermine his vigor and passion for life.
sentences.sCn: 实际上，这么大笔的遗产对他不仅没有什么好处，反而会损害他的活力和对生活的激情。

sentences.sContent: They would be lying there in the tree like, 'Oh, just let me just die up here, ' because they lacked any kind of vigor.
sentences.sContent_eng: They would be lying there in the tree like, 'Oh, just let me just die up here, ' because they lacked any kind of vigor.
sentences.sCn: 因为它们一点活力都没有, 他们会整天在树下躺着，一付‘噢，实在活不起了，让我死在这里好了’的样子。

remMethod.val: vig(生活) + or → 活力， 精力
